description: Finally, Rakka is helping Nemu and her superior Sumika at the library. She learns that there are other Haibane living in Guri and how Reki had contact with them a long time ago. At night, Rakka is asking herself even more questions; her joint secret with Nemu won`t actually answer much of these. And like others did before, she is looking for the "Beginning of the World".

titles.title: Bibliothèque - Usine abandonnée - Début du monde
Die Bibliothek / Die alte Fabrik / Der Anfang der Welt
Library / Abandoned Factory / The Beginning of the World
図書館・廃工場・世界のはじまり
